languages.text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.
languages.original_text:
В Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader компаньоны могут стать вашими верными спутниками. Вы сможете взять их в отряд, чтобы управлять ими во время заданий и использовать их возможности в бою.
Проработанный процесс кастомизации позволит вам решить, кем ваш компаньон был до начала приключения. Выбирая из множества вариантов, вы сможете настроить его внешность и определить характеристики и возможности для ведения боя.

traits.locale_text:
Companions in Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader can become loyal companions and help the main character on missions: they can be added to your squad and used in turn-based combat.
You can choose from a wide range of abilities and skills, such as combat skills, social skills and technical skills. These abilities and skills determine how your character interacts with the world and what challenges he can overcome.
Finally, you can choose your character's archetype. Each archetype path offers its own unique set of opportunities and challenges, so choose wisely.

In Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader, companions can become trusty followers of the main character. You can add them to your squad to control them on missions and to use them in turn-based combat.
When creating a companion, you can choose from a wide variety of combat, social, and technical skills and abilities which determine how the character interacts with the world, and what kind of challenges they can overcome.
Finally, you can choose the character's archetype. Each archetype path offers its own unique set of opportunities and challenges, so choose wisely.

In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

When creating a companion, you can choose from a wide variety of combat, social, and technical skills and abilities which determine how your character interacts with the world and what kind of challenges they are capable of overcoming.
Finally, you can choose the character's archetype. Each archetype path offers its own unique set of opportunities and challenges, so choose wisely.

In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

languages.text:
В Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader компаньоны могут стать вашими верными спутниками. Вы сможете взять их в отряд, чтобы управлять ими во время заданий и использовать их возможности в бою.

languages.original_text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
В Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader компаньоны могут стать верными спутниками вашего героя. Вы сможете взять их в отряд, чтобы управлять ими во время заданий и использовать их возможности в бою.
При создании компаньона вам предоставлен огромный выбор способностей и навыков, включая боевые, социальные и технические. От них зависит то, как персонаж будет взаимодействовать с окружающим миром и какие испытания он сможет преодолеть.
Наконец, вы можете выбрать архетип. Каждый архетип — это уникальный набор возможностей и вызовов, так что принимайте решение с умом.

В Warhammer 40,000 Rogue Trader компаньоны могут стать верными спутниками вашего героя. Вы сможете взять их в отряд, чтобы управлять ими во время заданий и использовать их возможности в бою.
При создании компаньона вам предоставлен огромный выбор способностей и навыков, включая боевые, социальные и технические. От них зависит то, как персонаж будет взаимодействовать с окружающим миром и какие испытания он сможет преодолеть.
Наконец, вы можете выбрать архетип. Каждый архетип — это уникальный набор возможностей и вызовов, так что принимайте решение с умом.

languages.text:
Dans Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, les compagnons peuvent devenir de fidèles alliés. Une fois intégrés à votre escouade, vous pouvez les contrôler lors de missions et utiliser leurs diverses compétences dans les combats au tour par tour.
Le processus de personnalisation détaillé vous permet de déterminer ce que votre compagnon a fait avant le début de l'aventure. La vaste gamme d'options à votre disposition vous permet de déterminer son apparence, ses caractéristiques et ses capacités de combat.
languages.original_text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
Dans Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, les compagnons peuvent devenir de fidèles alliés. Une fois intégrés à votre escouade, vous pouvez les contrôler lors de missions et utiliser leurs diverses compétences dans les combats au tour par tour.
Le processus de personnalisation détaillé vous permet de déterminer ce que votre compagnon a fait avant le début de l'aventure. La vaste gamme d'options à votre disposition vous permet de déterminer son apparence, ses caractéristiques et ses capacités de combat.

Dans Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, les compagnons peuvent devenir de fidèles alliés. Une fois intégrés à votre escouade, vous pouvez les contrôler lors de missions et de combats au tour par tour.
Lorsque vous créez un compagnon, vous avez le choix parmi un large éventail de capacités et de compétences martiales, sociales et techniques, qui déterminent la façon dont le personnage interagit avec l'environnement et les types de défis qu'il est capable de surmonter.
Pour finir, vous pouvez définir l'archétype du personnage. Chaque archétype offre des opportunités et des défis uniques, alors choisissez judicieusement.

languages.text:
En Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, los compañeros pueden convertirse en fieles seguidores. Puedes añadirlos a tu escuadrón y controlarlos durante las misiones para utilizar sus capacidades en el combate por turnos.
Un proceso detallado de personalización te permite elegir el pasado de tu compañero antes de unirse a tu aventura. Hay numerosas opciones para determinar su aspecto, sus características y sus capacidades de combate.
languages.original_text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
En Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, los compañeros pueden convertirse en fieles seguidores. Puedes añadirlos a tu escuadrón y controlarlos durante las misiones para utilizar sus capacidades en el combate por turnos.
Un proceso detallado de personalización te permite elegir el pasado de tu compañero antes de unirse a tu aventura. Hay numerosas opciones para determinar su aspecto, sus características y sus capacidades de combate.

languages.text:
『Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader』では、仲間を忠実な従者にできます。彼らを部隊に加え、ミッションで操作し、ターン制の戦闘でさまざまなスキルを活用しましょう。
詳細なカスタマイズにより、仲間があなたの冒険に加わる前にどのような人物だったかを選択できます。豊富な選択肢によって、その外見、特性、戦闘能力を自由に設定できます。
languages.original_text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
『Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader』では、仲間を忠実な従者にできます。彼らを部隊に加え、ミッションで操作し、ターン制の戦闘でさまざまなスキルを活用しましょう。
詳細なカスタマイズにより、仲間があなたの冒険に加わる前にどのような人物だったかを選択できます。豊富な選択肢によって、その外見、特性、戦闘能力を自由に設定できます。

languages.text:
在《战锤40K：行商浪人》中，您的同伴可以成为您忠实的追随者。您可以招募他们加入您的队伍，控制他们执行任务，命令他们在回合制战斗中施展各种各样的能力。
详尽的自定义功能可以让您自行选择未来会加入队伍的同伴。同伴创建菜单包含各种各样的设置，您可以决定同伴的外观、属性，以及他们的战斗能力。
languages.original_text:
In Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, companions can become loyal followers. You can add them to your squad and control them on missions, utilising their various skills in turn-based combat.
The detailed customisation process allows you to choose who your companion was before joining your adventure. With a wide variety of options, you can determine their appearance, their characteristics, and their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text:
在《战锤40K：行商浪人》中，您的同伴可以成为您忠实的追随者。您可以招募他们加入您的队伍，控制他们执行任务，命令他们在回合制战斗中施展各种各样的能力。
详尽的自定义功能可以让您自行选择未来会加入队伍的同伴。同伴创建菜单包含各种各样的设置，您可以决定同伴的外观、属性，以及他们的战斗能力。

languages.text:
In Warhammer 40.000 Rogue Trader können Gefährten loyale Gefolgsleute werden. Du kannst sie deinem Trupp hinzufügen, um sie auf Missionen in rundenbasierten Kämpfen zu steuern und ihre vielfältigen Fähigkeiten zu nutzen.
Der detaillierte Anpassungsprozess ermöglicht dir, festzulegen, wer dein Gefährte war, ehe er sich deinem Abenteuer angeschlossen hat. Du kannst mit einer Vielzahl von Optionen das Aussehen, die Eigenschaften und die Kampffähigkeiten deiner Gefährten bestimmen.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader'da yoldaşların, sadık takipçilerine dönüşebilir. Onları ekibine katıp görevlerde kontrol edebilir, tur tabanlı çatışmalarda birbirinden farklı yeteneklerinden yararlanabilirsin.
Ayrıntılı özelleştirme süreci, yoldaşının seninle maceraya atılmadan önce kim olduğunu seçebilmeni sağlar. Geniş bir seçenek yelpazesi arasından görünümlerini, niteliklerini ve çatışmadaki hünerlerini belirleyebilirsin.
languages.original_text:
